attributes.action: Make the Government treat the disabled with dignity and respect,,,, not rob us.
attributes.background: Every time there is a budget, the disabled always seem to get hit hard.  The government doesn't  seem to be able to hire decent companies who should have our welfare at heart,,, not have a underhand way to kick people off PIP and consequently cause financial hardship !!!!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
